articles.description: Aussie TV and radio star Bert Newton died on Saturday evening, seven months after he was admitted to hospital following a leg amputation
articles.content:
Australian TV legend Bert Newton has died aged 83 following a lengthy struggle with ill health.
The star died on Saturday evening, seven months after he was admitted to hospital following a leg ampu… [+1807 chars]
